ISSUE.TITLE: README of zh-TW is being translated into zh-CN
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link https://github.com/supabase/supabase/blob/master/i18n/README.zh-tw.md ## Describe the problem As title, the zh-TW translation is being translated into zh-CN. It seems that #14359 has modified the translation files using DeepL, a machine learning translation service. However, it only supports Simplified Chinese, but not Traditional Chinese. Also, from the repo the issue mentioned, the translated file only contains [README.zh.md](https://github.com/lyqht/deepL-demo/blob/master/docs/supabase/README.zh.md), which is Simplified Chinese. ## Describe the improvement Manually translate the zh-TW one, as DeepL seems to fail the job. ## Additional context DeepL only supports Simplified Chinese (简体中文), but not Traditional Chinese (繁體中文).

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #16727 from supabase/da/supavisor-docs chore: flesh out supavisor docs

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1 from jayeshr28/jayeshr28-patch-1 Issue Solved [#16499] Translated from simplified to traditional Chinese README.zh-tw.md
